resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77644</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aec-0474-41cc-2847-c9e2feb966f6#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Galgóci tarsolylemez.</string>
            <string language="en">Sabretache cover plate of Galgócz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sabretache Deckplatte von Galgócz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couvercle de Sabretache de Galgócz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Placa de tampa de Sabretache de Galgócz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coperchio di Sabretache di Galgócz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πιάτο κάλυψης Sabretache Galgσcz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tapadera de Sabretache de Galgócz</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Palettacsokrokkal és indafonattal gazdagon díszített, aranyozott felületű tarsolylemez.</string>
            <string language="en">Gilded sabretache cover plate richly decorated with palette rosettes and sarmentum plaitings</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  Galgóci tarsolylemez,  tarsolylemez,  honfoglalás kor,  trébelés,  poncolás,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, sabretache cover plate of Galgócz, sabretache cover plate, Hungarian settlement era, repoussage, granulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergoldete sabretache Deckplatte reich verziert 
mit Palette Rosetten und sarmentum plaitings</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couvercle doré de sabretache richement décoré 
des rosettes de palette et des plaitings de sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Placa de tampa gilded do sabretache decorada rica
com rosettes do palette e plaitings do sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coperchio gilded del sabretache pienamente 
decorato con le rosette della gamma di colori ed i plaitings di 
sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχρυσωμένο sabretache πιάτο κάλυψης που 
διακοσμείται πλουσιοπάροχα με τις ροζέτες παλετών και τα 
πλεξίματα sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tapadera dorada del sabretache adornada rico con 
los rosetones de la gama de colores y los plaitings del sarmentum</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, sabretache Deckplatte von 
Galgócz, sabretache Deckplatte, ungarische Regelung Ära, repoussage,
Granulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, couvercle de sabretache de 
Galgócz, couvercle de sabretache, ère hongroise de règlement, 
repoussage, granulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, placa de tampa de Galgócz, placa do
sabretache de tampa do sabretache, era hungarian do estabelecimento, 
repoussage, granulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, coperchio del sabretache di Galgócz, 
coperchio del sabretache, era ungherese di stabilimento, repoussage, 
granulazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, sabretache πιάτο κάλυψης Galgσcz, 
sabretache πιάτο κάλυψης, ουγγρική εποχή τακτοποίησης, 
repoussage, κοκκιοποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, tapadera del sabretache de Galgócz, 
tapadera del sabretache, era húngara del establecimiento, repoussage,
granulación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
